Trinamic's API Explained.except: In this video, Brian Kostecka explains what the Advanced Programming Interface (API) is and how to use it to your benefit.

How To Set Up a TMC4671.except: Oct 1, 2018  In this video, Onno explains how to set up the TMC4671, Trinamic's FOC servo controller.

How to use graphs.except: Jul 16, 2018  In this video, Field Application Engineer Thomas Ernst explains you how to use graphs and log data in a few easy steps with our TMCL-IDE. This allows for easy evaluation of Trinamic's TMCL products.

TMC2208 for A4988.except: Apr 24, 2018  This short video shows step by step how easy it is to replace the Allegro A4988 with Trinamic's TMC2208 legacy stepper driver.

Raspberry Pi and TMC5160.except: Apr 8, 2018  This blog post explains how to use the Raspberry Pi for real-time motor and motion control using the TMC5160-BOB. The wiring will be limited to the basic functionality for communication via SPI.

TMC5160 & Raspberry Pi.except: Feb 18, 2018  This blog post explains how to connect the TMC5160-BOB to the Raspberry Pi using Trinamic's API. The API minimizes the software effort required for driving stepper motors.

Homing Applications.except: Oct 3, 2017  In this short how-to video, one of our Field Application Engineers explains why applications need homing and how this can be done reliable and precise.

Arduino Mega with UART.except: Aug 1, 2017  This guide explains how to drive a stepper motor via UART using an Arduino Mega and TMC5072-EVAL. All that's needed is Single Wire UART to connect the TMC5072-EVAL with the Arduino Mega.

Adruino+TMC4361A+TMC2130.except: Jun 26, 2017  Explained step by step, this post explains how to wire up the TMC4361A-EVAL + TMC2130-EVAL combination to drive a stepper motor closed loop with an Arduino Uno.

TMC2100 SilentStepStick.except: May 28, 2017  In this video, one of our Field Application Engineers explains how to adjust the SilentStepStick for StealthChop in a few easy to follow steps.

TMCL Creator.except: Apr 23, 2017  In this video, we explain step by step how to use the TMCL Creator. The Creator is part of the TMCL-IDE and allows for quick coding of Trinamic's modules and ICs.

TMCM-3212.except: Apr 9, 2017  This video explains how to use the TMCM-3212 module for 3 axis stepper motor control with the TMCL-IDE.

Raspberry + TMC5130-EVAL.except: Apr 6, 2017  This start-up guide explains how to connect a Raspberry Pi 2 or 3 for basic operation of the TMC5130-EVAL board.

Arduino Mega + TMC5130.except: Apr 4, 2017  Using just a few wires including an SPI port, you can control the TMC5130-EVAL with your Arduino Mega. This guide explains you how to get started.

TMC2130 SilentStepStick.except: Jan 21, 2017  In this sample how-to, Stephan Watterott explains how to get started with your TMC2130 SilentStepStick on your Arduino.

Motion Wizzard.except: Jul 17, 2016  This Video shows in easy to follow steps, how to get started with the Trinamic Encoder Wiring Wizard for BLDC / PMSM Modules and one of Trinamics Eval Boards for BLDC / PMSM Modules  the TMCC160 Eval.

Hall Sensors.except: Jul 17, 2016  This Video shows in easy to follow steps, how to get started with the Trinamic Hall Sensor Wiring Wizard for BLDC / PMSM Modules and one of Trinamics Eval Boards for BLDC Modules  the TMCC160.

motionCookie.except: Jun 19, 2016  This videos shows in easy to follow steps how to get started with the Trinamic TMCC160 EVAL KIT and the Trinamic TMCL-IDE Interface.

Positioning.except: Jun 12, 2016  This video shows in easy to follow steps how to position a stepper motor with Trinamic TMCL-IDE Interface and Trinamic TMC5130 EVAL KIT.

Modular Eval System.except: Jan 7, 2016  In this session Thomas explains how our Trinamic Modular Evaluation System works, so lean back and relax.

StallGuard Interrupt.except: Dec 4, 2015  This blog post explains how to use the StallGuard interrupt via Trinamic's TMCL. Please note the added comment below the post for more information.

TMC5130 EVAL KIT.except: Nov 15, 2015  This video shows in easy to follow steps how to make a stepper motor turn with Trinamic TMC5130 EVAL KIT.
